text: A xɛrane rasiga a faladeni Yuda mangan Yosafati xa, a naxa, “Moyaba mangan bata murutɛ n xili ma. I waxi fa feni n fɔxɔ ra Moyaba yɛngɛdeni ba?” Yosafati yi a yabi, a naxa, “N sigama nɛn i fɔxɔ ra, i tan nun n tan keden na a ra, n ma sofane i ya sofane nan e ra, n ma soone i ya soone nan e ra.”
